data.eml:eml: Ants with Attitude: Australian Jack-jumpers of the Myrmecia pilosula species complex, with descriptions of four new species (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Myrmeciinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Taylor, Robert W. (2015): Ants with Attitude: Australian Jack-jumpers of the Myrmecia pilosula species complex, with descriptions of four new species (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Myrmeciinae). Zootaxa 3911 (4): 493-520, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3911.4.2
